approach.title: My Approach
paragraphs: I believe in building backend systems that are not just functional, but also maintainable and scalable. Every API endpoint, database query, and service integration is designed with performance and reliability in mind. I focus on creating clean abstractions, comprehensive documentation, and robust error handling to ensure systems can evolve gracefully.

When tackling complex problems, I start with understanding the requirements, then design the architecture before writing code. This approach helps me deliver solutions that are both efficient and easy to extend.
